attributes.action: force Sheffield City Council to overturn their decision to make Abbeydale Grange School form a hard federation or close
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the Sheffield council overturn and revisit their decision to force Abbeydale Grange School into a hard federation, or if a suitable partner school is not found, close it down. We propose that any decision on the future of the school is postponed until the outcome of this years exam results and the upcoming OFSTED report is published.
